Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2012 01:16AM daisyv wrote: My former oncologist: I just lost a patient who had lung mets so bad she could barely walk across the room when diagnosed.  She and her husband decided to retire and travel and she lived ten years.  Wouldn't it be great if everyone could just retire and travel?
Posts.Title: Lets do a Sh*t People say to Metastatic BC Patients Fitztwins ChicagoGirl
